#include<bits/stdc++.h>

typedef long long int ll;
using namespace std;

#define MOD 1000000007
ll gcd(ll i,ll j)
{
    if(j==0)
        return i;
    return gcd(j,i%j);
}
int main()
{
    ll arr[205];
    ll visited[205];
 
    ll n,tc,j;
    cin>>tc;
 
    while(tc--)
    {
        queue <ll> q;
         memset(visited,0,sizeof(visited));
        ll i;
        ll ans=1;
        cin>>n;
        for(i=0;i<n;i++)
            cin>>arr[i];
        sort(arr,arr+n,greater<int>());
        for(ll k=0;k<n;k++)
        {
            if(visited[k]==0)
            {
 
                q.push(k);visited[k]=-1;
                ans=(ans*arr[k])%MOD;
                while(!q.empty())
                {
                   i=q.front();q.pop();
 
                   for(j=0;j<n;j++)
                   {
                    if(visited[j]==0 && gcd(arr[i],arr[j])>1)
                        {
                            q.push(j);
                            visited[j]=-1;
                        }
                   }
 
                }
            }
        }
        cout<<ans<<endl;
    }
        return 0;
}
